content.rendered:
If you are looking for car rental service , then you have landed at the right place we offers you all types of car rental services for Darjeeling Sikkim region on point to point basis to our Traveller, You can easily book your car rental with us. we offer you a wide range of medium and large sized with the Cheap, Economical, Best/Comfortable Car/Taxi Rental by providing updated information and rates.

Pls Note:- There are certain restrictions on use of vehicle in Darjeeling-Sikkim region. This include the following.
1. The daily basis vehicle wont be able to undertake local sight seeing in Darjeeling, Pelling, Gangtok. Seperate vehicle has to be booked for this purpose at additional charge.
2. Forest visit in Dooars have to be undertaken in seperate vehicles specially provided for this purpose.
3. The vehicles are not allowed to enter Gangtok city during day time. A local taxi has to be arranged by the guest at their own cost for transfer from Hotel to Taxi Stand or back.
4. For tour to North Sikkim, complete package tour has to be booked
5. The rates given will not be applicable for Bhutan region, for Bhutan region pls write a mail or give us call on 9911572642.

Car Rental Price List For Darjeeling – Sikkim Region

From Bagdogra / NJP to Darjeeling Transfer 3800 2800 2600
From Bagdogra / NJP to Kalimpong Transfer 3800 2800 2600
From Bagdogra / NJP to Phuentsholing Transfer 6800 5000 4800
From Gangtok to Pelling Transfer 4300 4000 3800
From Gangtok to Darjeeling Transfer 4500 3000 2800
From Gangtok to Kalimpong Transfer 4300 2800 2600
From Darjeeling to Pelling Transfer 4300 3000 2800
From Darjeeling to Kalimpong Transfer 4100 2700 2500
From Darjeeling to Mirik Transfer 3800 2500 2300
From Darjeeling to Gangtok via Kalimpong Transfer 5800 4500 4300
From Darjeeling to NJP/Airport Transfer 5300 4000 3800
From Kalimpong to Pelling Transfer 4300 3000 2800

Gangtok Sight Seeings

Sectors

Innova / Xylo
7 Member

Sumo / Max
8-9 Member

Waganor / Alto 4 Member
Gangtok to Tsomgo Lake 4800 4000 NOT ALLOWED
Gangtok to Tsomgo Lake, Baba Mandhir & Nathula Pass. (Indo-Chinese Border) 7800 6500 NOT ALLOWED
Gangtok Half Day Sight Seeing 7 points (4 hours) 3800 NOT ALLOWED 2200
Gangtok Fulll Day Sight Seeing including Rumtek Monastery  (World Heritage Site). 4300 NOT ALLOWED 2700
Gangtok to Namchi. 4500 3500 3300

Note
1. Everyone must carry 4 copies of Pass port size photo & original photo identity card (Min. 4 copies) to get permit for Tsomgo Lake & Nathu-La Pass.

Nathu La Pass: Visit to Nathu La Pass depends on permits and road conditions. For visiting Nathu La Pass, a special permission is required From Indian Army. Please note that the pass is closed on Mondays & Tuesdays every week and in the winter.

7 Member

8-9 Member

Waganor / Alto 4 Member

Darjeeling Half Day Sightseeing including Tiger Hill 3800 2500 2300

Darjeeling Joy Ride (Train Ticket Extra) 2300 1000 800
Excursion to Mirik Lake & Pasupati Market. 4300 2800 2600

Full day Pelling Sightseeing. (7 points)
1.       Darap Village.
2.       Rimbi Waterfalls.
3.       Rimbi Rock Garden.
4.       Kanchenjunga Waterfalls.
5.       Khechopari Lake.
6.       Pemaynagtse Monastery.
7.       Rabdentse Palace Ruins.		 300 2800 2600
Half day Pelling Sightseeings. (2 points)
1.       Chagay Waterfalls.
2.       Singshore Bridge. (Asia 2nd Highest Bridge)		 3300 2200 2000

2.       Flower Nurseries.
3.       Durpin Dara Hills.
4.       Dr. Graham’s Home.		 3300 2200 2000
Kalimpong Full day Sightseeing including Lava. 4300 3200 3000
